sentences.en: ...a plot to dupe stamp collectors into buying fake rarities.
sentences.cn: …一个欺骗集邮爱好者购买假冒珍品的阴谋。

sentences.en: Be the dupe of the infinite!
Black - and - white dupe negative film.
Black - and - white dupe positive film.
But he was not for a single instant the dupe of her blundering alacrity.
sentences.cn: 但是他一刻也不会上当去相信她这种冒冒失失的殷勤.

sentences.en: Dupe this and keep one copy.
sentences.cn: 复印一下这东西,留一份起来.

sentences.en: He becomes an innocent dupe in a political scandal.
sentences.cn: 他在一起政治丑闻中成了一名无辜的受骗者。

sentences.en: He was accused of being a dupe of the Americans.
sentences.cn: 他被控是美国人的傀儡。

sentences.en: I won't be his dupe any longer.
Or they aim to dupe them into turning over passwords and bank details.
sentences.cn: 或者哄骗受害者更换密码和银行资料.

sentences.en: The mind is always the dupe of the heart.
The young politician's inexperience is making him the dupe of some unscrupulous schemers.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻政客的毫无经验使得他被一些无耻的阴谋家当作冤大头.

sentences.en: They struck in with him and helped him to dupe the old man.
sentences.cn: 他们勾结他,帮助他哄骗那老人.

sentences.en: We know some sex offenders dupe the psychologists who assess them.
sentences.cn: 我们知道有些性犯罪者会愚弄给他们做测评的心理学家。

sentences.en: Why did Blizzard Entertainment only delete some of the dupes, and not every dupe?
sentences.cn: 问:为什么Blizzard仅仅是删除一些复制的物品装备而不是全部的?

sentences.en: You see something you want and you ask the owner if you can dupe it.
sentences.cn: 你看到某件你想要的东西,就去问那东西的主人能否让你复制一份.

sentences.en: You wonder why they can clone sheep but you can't dupe the cows.
sentences.cn: 你不明白为什么他们能克隆羊而你不能复制牛.

trans.tran_en: A dupe is someone who is tricked by someone else
